Burbank.Twelve Oaks Lodge: Twelve Oaks Lodge is a historic property located in Verdugo City, in the La Crescenta area of Glendale, California. Initially a private residence on 4 1/2 wooded acres, it was converted into a retirement home in 1935 and later functioned as an assisted living facility. The property re-opens April 2017 and is managed by Northstar Senior Living, after being closed for 3 years.
